CustomField.description: Shows the weekday as per the Leave Start Date.
CustomField.formula: IF(WEEKDAY(Leave_Start_Date__c) == 1, 'Sunday', IF(WEEKDAY(Leave_Start_Date__c) == 2, 'Monday', IF(WEEKDAY(Leave_Start_Date__c) == 3, 'Tuesday', IF(WEEKDAY(Leave_Start_Date__c) == 4, 'Wednesday', IF(WEEKDAY(Leave_Start_Date__c) == 5, 'Thursday', IF(WEEKDAY(Leave_Start_Date__c) == 6, 'Friday', IF(WEEKDAY(Leave_Start_Date__c) == 7, 'Saturday', '') ) ) ) ) ) )
CustomField.label: Leave Start Day
